contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be expressed positively. Alternate translation: "be sure to punish him" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-doublenegatives]])
contextId.glQuote: do not let him go free from punishment

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be expressed positively. Alternate translation: "I have agreed to his demands" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-doublenegatives]])
